default_path = 'data/Event2012/'¶
static load_data(file_paths=None)[source]¶

Load and concatenate data from multiple .npy files.

Parameters:

file_paths – List of file paths to load data from. If None, default paths will be used.

Returns:

Concatenated numpy array.
